Review.Titre: Service is super slow and unreliable
Review.Contenu: Service is super slow and unreliable. When we called about it they said it was our fault for the location.. Then every month we have to call because they over-charge us by $25 for a service we don't have but they say we do so it's a constant back and forth argument about what service we do have. Not worth the time or effort.

Review.Titre: Pathetic Customer Service
Review.Contenu: When I opted for Hughes Net Gen 5 service, the name on my account was recorded by a very poor English speaker representative as Douglass. I didn’t know of the mistake until my statement arrived. That was three years ago!!!!! Apparently Hughes Net didn’t seem to care that three years of monthly bills were actually being paid on a Visa Card, ending in 1555 by me , Dennis not Douglass!!!!! Over the years , when I talked to representatives, I tried to get my name corrected but without success.  So now I wish to terminate my contract and have been asked to “prove” there is no Douglass in my house by sending personal documents via E-FAX to a fax number 5854193727. I submitted my documents repeatedly to this number and received error messages. First it was denied, then it was accepted, then it was denied. After 3/4 calls to Hughes service centre, they were unable to verify the fax had arrived, they were unable to look at my visa name to verify that it was Dennis paying for the service for the last three years, they were unable to provide another fax number, in fact they were unable to suggest anyway of resolving this simple but stupid problem after several hours!!!!! My wife even called the fax number and was told “ the e-fax  did not go through because someone answered the call” and that the number was a scam. So I called my ViSA company and put a block on my Hughes Net payment next month as a way of canceling this service on Jan 18th 2024.  I hope that Hughes will provide a box and shipping label so that I can send their equipment back next month. The Hughes Net service has been great, their service center in Rochester NY  has been appalling. Would not recommend them to anyone after this.

I bought the dish and related equipment and, when asked, i told people that Hughes was better than having no internet. I recently found a much less expensive hotspot service with unlimited highspeed and emailed ot cancel my Hughes service. I received a response by email informing me I must telephone to cancel servie. During that too long conversation i was informed there would be a $400 cancellation fee. Again, I purchased their equipment so they had no costs to disconnect my service. I asked repeatedly to speak with a supervisor and was not transferre.I was referred to the Hughes contract by text. There is a cancellation fee described in their legal docs.

Review.Titre: I was a Hughesnet subscriber for several years.
Review.Contenu: I was a Hughesnet subscriber for a total of 11 years. I can honestly say this is the worst internet provider I have ever had. You purchase their service and it will be okay for 1 month. After you have gotten past your 30 day window then your service is degraded to the other subscribers level. When you call customer service you will be speaking to someone you can hardly understand reading from a script to “try” to diagnose your problem. They will tell you everything looks good on their end and will ask how the weather is in your area. After this you may be issued a case number and be told they will turn it over to the engineering department and they will be back in touch with you. They will tell you that they are sorry and may either give you a little data or knock 10 dollars off your bill. Your speed may increase for a few days and then it will go right back to the way it was. If you decide you want to cancel your service they will send you to their “customer retention” department where you will speak to an American who will either say they will escalate your case and give you a rebate for a few months and some extra data if you will give them a chance to “fix” the problem. Hughesnet has oversold their service and there’s only one way to “fix” the problem, find another internet provider. I HIGHLY recommend Starlink if it is available in your area. The upfront cost is about $600 dollars but it is well worth it, especially compared to Hughesnet. There is no comparison between the two. Starlink has times when your internet slows somewhat due to congestion but you still have usable internet. I’m not saying Starlink is the best option but if you’re having to use satellite internet it is definitely worth looking into. If I can only save one person the agony of dealing with Hughesnet my review will be worth while.

Review.Titre: It took a month and five cancelled…
Review.Contenu: It took a month and five cancelled installation dates before service was finally installed. Once installed a few days ago, upload and download speeds have been slow and worse than the provider I got rid of due to their slow speeds. Very disappointed.

Review.Titre: I called to cancel my service because I…
Review.Contenu: I called to cancel my service because I haven't been getting 25 mbps like I was told. I was on the phone with "Mary" for for about 20 minutes and she kept talking in circles on trying to make it right and keep me as a customer..  I requested a supervisor or a manager and she wouldn't put me through.  I reminded her that our conversation was being recorded.  She then stalled for another long while "trying" to put me through to the escalation line so I could talk to a manager.  Meanwhile she came back and told me that my service had been canceled and gave me the ID#.  Then said something to the effect of since the service had been canceled if I needed anything more.  I said I needed to still speak to a supervisor.  I'm still on the phone now and its been 54 minutes.  Customer service is very poor.

Review.Titre: Extremely poor customer service
Review.Contenu: I named my HughesNet network "Slower than dial-up" and that sums up the internet service. Very slow, nowhere near the speeds they advertise. Their customer service is even worse than their internet speeds. I have interacted with their customer service department multiple times and they are impressively bad. I have made changes to the account, which included faxing paperwork and speaking with them multiple times, but they never did get the changes made. The only reason to use this service is if there are absolutely no other options.

Review.Titre: On Nov 10 I request a booster order…
Review.Contenu: On Nov 10 I request a booster order number #22927337 today is Nov 19 and I still waiting for the booster. I have called a couple times I was told to wait until thanks giving day. How is possible if you ship through UPS you don’t have a tracking number. You disrespect a customer.

Review.Titre: No compassion
Review.Contenu: I have had Hughesnet as my Internet provider for over 10 years. I live in the country and have no other option for Internet.  The service has not been that great, and the costs are high, but I stuck with it and paid my bills timely. Recently, my husband had to have any knee replacement and money has been very tight. I’ve had to takeoff work to take care of him. I called Hughesnet and asked for an extension to pay my bill at a later date which was only a week and a half. As time drew closer to the extended date, I realized that I could only make a partial payment so I called on two separate occasions to try to make a partial payment and schedule the rest to be paid on another another date a week later. This is the first time I have ever been late in over 10 years, Mind you. When I called these two times, I was told back to call back on the date that I had promised to pay and make the partial payment. When I called that day, they told me that they sent it to my bank to be paid and the whole bill was extracted from my checking account and it was overdrawn. If I was not told by two separate people from the Hughesnet  company that I could call on that date and pay a partial payment, I wouldn’t be so upset. When I called on the arranged date, they said it could not be done that my payment was already withdrawn and that basically they got their money and there’s nothing I can do about it. When a company has no compassion for their customers, they have no business being a company. Needless to say, I will be canceling my Hughesnet service, and will be sure to spread the word what kind of company this really is.

Review.Titre: If I could go back in time…..
Review.Contenu: If I could go back in time and do one thing, it would no longer be meeting my grandmother, but it would now be finding my husband and smacking him before he was able to set us up with HughesNet. It has been an absolute nightmare. The service never works. We have called time and time again and have been told our satellite is misaligned and we need to pay $150 for them to come out and readjust our satellite but the next time there is a storm, it’ll get misaligned and we’ll need to pay the fee all over again. I’ve had their helpline people yell at and be rude to me before and I’m sick and tired of paying over $100 a month for literally nothing. The moment we get home we have to take our phones off the internet and use our cellular data. The man that came out and installed all the devices mounted one to the window, and when there was a fire, I couldn’t get out the window of our bedroom and had to run through the smoke and flames to get out of my house. I’ve gotten everyone in our neighborhood to request GVEC fiber internet come to our street and until they do, we’re jumping over to GVEC wireless internet.

Review.Titre: Trash internet!
Review.Contenu: Trash internet!! Only get if you want to be money gouge. We are from Texas this is the worst Internet I have ever had. Buffering & constantly have to add tokens this is 2023 their Internet is crap. We canceled & they stole 300 dollars out of our account without our consent. They expect you as a customer to climb on roof to get a part off that we have no idea & didn't install very crap service. Run the other way

Review.Titre: Don't do it...
Review.Contenu: Unfortunately I have had nothing but bad experience with HughesNet. To start off, the most important thing I made clear is that I would need to make and receive phone calls, this does not work. On top of that, my data would only last five to seven days at the start of a billing cycle, that was with streaming Netflix three to four days a week,  maybe one to two hours, either way, fairly light internet use. Even when I did have data most streaming devices were pixelated and would not make it through an entire episode before freezing and disconnecting. I constantly had to unplug and reset the router. When I went to cancel my service I found out there was a $400 cancellation fee. You also have to return all the equipment yourself otherwise you will get charged and extra $300. I just switched to starlink and it works phenomenally for anything I want.

If it rains lightly here for 3 minutes the system goes off line entirely. It took 10 minutes to load this page to make this rating.

When I called they refused to refund my money and said it was a valid charge for me canceling. Be careful going through Hughs net

Review.Titre: HughesNet is used as a torture device…
Review.Contenu: HughesNet is used as a torture device in third world countries. If I had to choose between HughesNet and death row, I would pick death. It took me almost 2 weeks to cancel HughesNet after using them as a last resort for 1 1/2 years. Children in Africa or on Mars have better Internet than what HughesNet provides. They tried to hold me to contracts that they blatantly stated were "incorrect", charged me over $300/month for a product that worked less than 70% of the time, provided "support" that could barely read let alone understand the script. I had to reset my entire network every morning and it would still take me more than an hour to have semi-functioning Internet, which would still drop periodically throughout the day. I had one tech explain to me "space is really far away and it takes a long time for the signal to get there and back" and tell me that the weather looked overcast in my area, while I was staring out the window at clear blue skies. It cost me $8000 to be able to use Starlink, and it was worth every cent to get away from HughesNet. The last week of dealing with them left me crying and shaking because it was so stressful and difficult. I will be setting that dish up with Tannerite, since it can't function for Internet anyway.

I have been told TWICE my acp benefit has been transferred (which I haven't done) so I'm being charged full price 140.51 . I think hughesnet is a scam. First install date the installation guy reported my landlord ran him off property which I proved was a bold face lie. All this has happened in just 30 days!!!!!! So last thing I told Lind( that refused to let me talk to supervisor ) is to shut off my service then I hung up . But I know that won't be done by my request but IT WILL BE FOR NON PAYMENT!!!!!! I am a heart patient n don't need this internet service put me in my grave. HUGHESNET SUCKS!!!!!!!!

We have increased our service to the maximum and pay over $100 a month.  We have no other service to turn to and are dependent upon it for phone, TV, and internet.  Between 6 PM and 11 PM, our daily service is also poor.  WE has complained but nothing has been done.  During Joe Biden's inauguration, we had no problem with problems with coverage. Could someone help and get them to increase rural services to livable levels?

Review.Titre: I expected at least 15 Mbps but get nothing close and lose connections…
Review.Contenu: I just had the system installed this afternoon.  I expected at least 15 Mbps but only average 4Mbps and disconnects .  The modem is operational.  I cannot stream, I cannot check my financial accounts or complete work. The speed was maximum 7 Mbps and averages 4 Mbps and has disconnected completely three times -- all within the first hours of usage.  I called tech support and they blamed it on possibly the weather and said to wait 24 hours and try again.  If this is what I can expect from Hughes Net then I will need to cancel the entire account and go back to my original provider, which was not always reliable, but at least less expensive and more reliable than this!!  I am very disappointed and verging toward angry at this situation.

Review.Titre: We have been a customer for 10+ years
Review.Contenu: We have been a customer for 10+ years. Our service has never been very good, but recently a bird flew into our satellite dish and knocked the service out entirely.  We didn't even realize it for three weeks because we were so used to not having internet. When we finally called, we talked to one customer service manager that saved our account and sent us a new router, but unfortunately that did not fix the problem.  Long story short we decided to cancel our service and they can't even cancel it and send us a box to send their equipment back until the end of the billing cycle! How insane is that. We haven't had service since the middle of October and we can't get a box until the end of November. The inefficiency of this company is amazing.  I would not recommend them to anyone.  In fact before this I have always steered people away from them. If you live in the country and want great internet try T-mobile. It saved us $34 a month and no 15g metered internet limit!!! I wish we had found them sooner!

Review.Titre: Confusion and chaos setting up a new account
Review.Contenu: When I called Hughesnet to explain that my husband had passed away and I needed to delete his name on the account and replace his name with mine. I was told that a new account had to be set up. So I was transferred to the sales dept. I was given a promo cost for internet service which I agreed to. Then a date was scheduled for a new modem and to check the outside dish equipment. When I called Nov 15, there was total confusion on the customer service side of Hughesnet. I had to explain numerous times to start my new account, giving my account number again and again. I told the representative that the technician had installed a new modem and I needed to ensure that my husband's account was cancelled and I had a new account which needed to be activated. I was told my account had been done incorrectly with my husband's name on my account.  No one at Hughesnet could find my account number. I kept telling everyone the account number that was my husband's needed to be cancelled. That I couldn't put my name on his account, I had a new account and kept telling the representative my account number, which he couldn't find. That should have been an easy fix, delete my husband's account and start my new account. I was totally confused and asked to speak with a supervisor. Only when I spoke to a supervisor at the account management dept did I feel the issues of starting a new account was resolved. Now I get another email scheduling a techician on Nov 20 to install a new modem. On Nov 15 the technician had completed this work and I signed the agreement the work was finished. I am now waiting for the box to return the modem.

Review.Contenu: my contact went out in the middle of a job and i lost the job how do u think i feel im pissed off and u still bill me for a month of internet service im look for a better service at this point

Review.Titre: I can’t get anyone to help with rebate…
Review.Contenu: I can’t get anyone to help with rebate gift card v I’m very disappointed in your company. I can’t wait for my 2 year contract to expire.  And I will not recommend your company to even my worst enemy   2 years can’t come fast enough!

Review.Titre: THEY WILL SCAM YOU!
Review.Contenu: THEY WILL SCAM YOU!! I needed internet for my job while. when I was signing up I was making sure there was no fee for the cancellation as I was going to only be there for about 4 months. The internet NEVER worked and I called multiple times about it but they did nothing. I ended up canceling and now they are trying to charge me $461 for a cancellation fee even though they said I would have no fee. Now they are ruining my credit and I owe $461 for NOTHING. The internet NEVER worked and they promised no cancellation fee because I was going to be there for a short time. DO NO GET IT.

Review.Titre: Company and service are pathetic
Review.Contenu: Company and service are pathetic. Plain and simple! Severely lacking employees that provide good customer service. I guess it goes along with the lack of good internet service. Would never recommend to even my worst enemy..

Review.Titre: Literally the worst internet service
Review.Contenu: Literally the worst internet service. The service worked perfectly for our first 30 days and then afterward now barely works at our house. Our streaming will not even play movies.

Review.Titre: Absolutely the worst internet
Review.Contenu: Absolutely the worst internet I have ever had!!!! It never worked properly, cannot not stream TV for one TV or won't even run a cell phones wifi. My hot spot with my cell phone has better internet. Take my review as a warning and go with another company. The charges more than double the second month of service and this company is charging me a $400 cancellation fee. I cancelled service 8 hours after the 30 days that's ridiculous and of course and manger was not available to speak with me. I had to cancel my credit card just to keep them from continually to bill me.

Review.Titre: Waste of time and money
Review.Contenu: Waste of time and money. They lied about the speeds they could provide in my area to get me to sign up-only refunded me a portion of my money when I cancelled because I could never get efficient download/upload speeds. It’s a huge hassle to get them to put up the equipment and an even bigger hassle to take it all down yourself and send it back. Spent way to much time and money on this experience and would never recommend them to any I know. Customer service was nice all the times I had to call…guess that’s worth the one star.

Review.Titre: WORST EXPERIENCE EVER!!
Review.Contenu: WORST EXPERIENCE EVER!!! DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!! I HAD MULTIPLE ISSUES THAT NO FORIEGN REPRESENTATIVE COULD HELP ME WITH, THEY HAVE NO COMPASSION AND WILL LIE TO YOU 100 PERCENT. DAMAGES DONE TO MY HOME AT INSTALLATION AND STILL HAS NOT BEEN FIXED. DONT USE THIS SORRY SERVICE...EVER...TRUST ME

Review.Titre: Hughes internet SCAMMED ME AND STOLE FROM ME
Review.Contenu: Before signing up with Hughes internet, please see this YouTube video: Hughes Internet SCAMMED ME AND STOLE FROM METhis video discusses and shows proof in the form of a recorded call that Hughes Internet failed to honor, and STILL refuses to honor it's agreement with me. For the past 4 months, Hughes has been charging me $20.02 over the amount we agreed to on January 12 2023. Avoid Hughes Internet AT ALL COST! I wish I would have!

Review.Titre: If I could leave 0 stars I would
Review.Contenu: If I could leave 0 stars I would. Not for the spotty service that was interrupted everytime there was the smallest cloud in the sky, not for the extremely low download speeds, not even for the poor quality whenever I did have a connection. No, this review is totally based on the severe lack of customer service we received when we decided to cancel our service to go with a different provider. On top of the ridiculously expensive disconnect fee, we were charged for 2 extra months of service, even after fully confirming that our service was canceled with confirmation that we WOULD NOT be charged for anything further. They were not helpful at all when trying to reach a resolution and I would suggest to anyone to steer clear of Hughes Net if they don't want to spend hundreds of extra dollars for a service they aren't even using.

Review.Titre: FAR Slower Than Advertised
Review.Contenu: The internet speed was FAR slower than what HughesNet advertises. You essentially pay a lot for the worst service money can buy. Other satellite providers offer better speed. Don’t go with this company!

Review.Titre: My inter.net speed did not improve…l
Review.Contenu: My inter.net speed did not improve after I spent a long time with a tech. In my area I amLooking into another source I believe I was told that a new satellite was put up but not yet conected.

Review.Titre: NOT happy with Internet Provider HughNET
Review.Contenu: First of all, it's too expensive! Of all internet providers, HughsNET absolutely is the worse for rural internet. I lived on the Navajo reservation, I have had a good provider for the reservation location for 7 years. Moved to a rural area using another Navajo provider until policies changed due to location areas they provide. I am not happy with hughsNET, always running out of data usage before middle of the month. I never had to pay this much for using internet and running out of data in 12 days!!YES, I'm so dissatisfied with HughsNet.

Review.Titre: Absolute worst
Review.Contenu: Can't stream. If you try and can tolerate the constant buffering ,  data is gone just a few days into the month. I have had several internet providers over the years . HughesNet is the absolute worst .

Review.Titre: Do better
Review.Contenu: We canceled our service over a year ago and never received the return package to send back the equipment. Out of nowhere, we are charged like we still have service and we do not. We were told if we are refunded, we would be charged over 300.00 until equipment is returned but we won’t receive the package until the middle of august. It looks like we have to pay for a mistake someone else made in not sending us the return packaging and properly canceling our account. That’s dirty. Never again.

Review.Titre: The company will fool you with promises…
Review.Contenu: The company will fool you with promises of great internet service and connections. If you're a customer and you need a technician to come to your place to service anything you will be charged. If you have any issues with the service the phone representative is not able to communicate with you and will hang up upon being frustrated. I have been without service and no one was able to help. After resolving the problem myself, my next bill was increased by $30.00. When I called the representative told me it was the way that HughesNet bills. I will be having increased monthly payments for the remainder of the service. If it is inclement weather you will experience no service. If a rogue cloud passes you will have no service. If a bird flies over, you will have no service. You can look forward to the hours between 2a-4a(can vary) for free data. It isn't great during those times but, a little better than the other hours during the day.

Review.Titre: In June of 2023
Review.Contenu: In June of 2023, we canceled our subscription to Hughes net. That was six months ago. They are still hitting our bank account  for $145 a month. We have returned all the equipment they told us too.

Review.Titre: Modem received was defective
Review.Contenu: Modem received was defective. Hughes representative said a return shipping label was on the shipping box, there was no return label. Representative said I would have to pay for return shipping. If Hughes wants the defective modem Hughes needs to come and get it.

Review.Titre: Called to schedule service had…
Review.Contenu: Called to schedule service had everything set up the date came and no show. I called and it had never been scheduled but they charged my card. I called the number provided for assistance on multiple occasions and they can’t find my account but they billed my card. Every time they transfer me I have to talk to someone else and repeat my story horrible company!!!!

Review.Titre: I watch my news in the morning and it…
Review.Contenu: I watch my news in the morning and it will be interrupted by a green circle and takes a couple of minutes for the news to come back on, It does that to other channels, I wasn't able to use my cell phone with Hughes Net. I went back to my own internet and need to cancel Hughes Net

Review.Titre: As bad as the 1000s of reviews say it is
Review.Contenu: We called 4 times.   The first agent had a solution that sounded reasonable.   We tried to problem solve.  The next 3 agents had different stories.  I feel like this company uses false advertising.  I can't work from home? It says I can...that's why I bought it? No live streaming? I wasn't told that by anyone at anytime.  The Google reviews were right...the service is terrible both customer and actual internet.  The web surfing was awful, 10 seconds between pages...if they even opened.  Just a joke.  I should have trusted the 1000s of awful reviews.Now I have to go on my roof and take down a satellite dish? Ridiculous.  30 day satisfaction guarantee is a lie.  Do not trust Hughes net.  You will regret it.

Review.Titre: Waist of money
Review.Contenu: First off at installation the guy left trash everywhere,  made a mess in my bathroom and the service was terrible,  I was never able to stream , couldn't use wifi calling COMPLETE WAIST OF MONEY

Review.Titre: This is the slowest Internet I have…
Review.Contenu: This is the slowest Internet I have ever used in my life. Including dial up. I have had to cancel some of my streaming services because the Internet is too slow to use them. Downloads are 3 times faster on cell data. I would never recommend your service to anyone.

Review.Titre: My modem stopped working and I am…
Review.Contenu: My modem stopped working and I am expected to pay for the delivery of my replacement modem. I had 3 days of use this year and the modem quit. This is very poor customer service. The agent, Mr. G,  did all he could do, but Hughes policy determined how this interaction was going to end.

Review.Titre: Reliability of the equipment
Review.Contenu: Reliability of the equipment.  My internet was down, so called tech support.  They reset my system and everything was working for only a few hours, then went down again.  Called tech support and they decided to send a tech out to check on system.  Tech came out, got everything working.  Then a few hours after tech left the system went down again.  Surely your modems should be more reliable than that?

Review.Titre: HughesNet SUCKS
Review.Contenu: HughesNet SUCKS! You might as well not have internet. Paying almost $100/month for service that only works about half the time. Don't even THINK about trying to get on the internet while it's cloudy or rainy. You'd be better off watching paint dry.

Review.Titre: Expensive and Slow
Review.Contenu: It’s too expensive to keep buying tokens to stream a movie or play games. It’s so slow on our basic program that we don’t even bother with it unless we pay for all the extra tokens. Disappointing.

Review.Titre: On September 4th terrible service
Review.Contenu: On September 4th, I found that I had no Email. I called Hughes and connected to a young lady that kept me on the phone for over 35 minutes. She knew nothing about helping me, so I asked to talk to a supervisor. We got cut off so I called back. Again another young lady who kept me on the pone for over 35 minutes to no avail, WE got disconnected so I waited several hours and called back. This time I got a young man who again knew nothing about how to solve my problem. I waited and called the next day and got connected to a lady, who spoke better English and know how to solve my prblem. After about 10-15 minutes she got me connected and so far so good.

Review.Titre: Have not received mg “ Free 5GB token”
Review.Contenu: Hello:I purchased a 5 GB token from an email I received from Hughesnet for “ Buy one token get one token free” offer. I purchased the token on 10/31/23, at 11:55 pm, CDT. So,  the offer was still Valid when I purchased it (had not expired)It is now 11/8/23 and I still have not received my free 5GB token from HN. I have emailed them and did not receive a response back. I called them and the agent (who was very difficult to understand) told me I should receive it by 11/05/23. I still have not received my 5 GB “free” token. I’ve used HN for a long time and have not had any trouble like this before. Thank you**Edit:  this matter has been resolved as I have now received my 5 GB token.  Change from 1 star to 5 stars. Thanks!

Review.Titre: Hughes billed me for services I did NOT…
Review.Contenu: Hughes billed me for services I did NOT receive. I requested for my service to be suspended for three months. I was billed for full service.

Review.Titre: My Internet has not worked very well…
Review.Contenu: My Internet has not worked very well since day one. I was on the phone two different times for more than an hour at a time. I was told to be near my modem. I was actually sitting right beside my modem. There were no walls between me. Agent just did not seem to be able to help.

Review.Titre: I only receive 15gb of internet service…
Review.Contenu: I only receive 15gb of internet service a month for 76.63. So when that runs out...you are out! I called about it and was told I could increase to 50gb for 79.99 a month. Well that sounded like a better deal than what I was paying for so I said lets do that. THEN they tried to charge me 20.00 extra a month to send me an invoice! Can you believe that....20.00 for a slip of paper that they send their customers! They wanted me to have it charged to a credit card to avoid it. SO needless to say I am currently shopping around for a new ISP.  Highway robbery. I reported it to the FCC.

Review.Titre: The service is way to slow for the…
Review.Contenu: The service is way to slow for the price. I could get out of the contract without paying I would cancel the plan now. I asked not to be put on automatic draft and they did it anyway so now my account is in the negative and they won't do anything to fix it.

Review.Titre: STAY AWAY FROM HUGHESNET!
Review.Contenu: Everything has been horrible since I called to get service. I Was told 100GB per month was more than enough with a Fusion plan for streaming services. I stream everything at my house and within 20 days I had already reached 100GB. When I called, I Was told that nobody would ever say that and the lies began.I have called 6-7 times in 4 months because the internet was extremely slow and no matter what was tried, nothing got better.After 4 months, I Was told (after replacing the original modem) that the Fusion was never configured 100% after they finished setting it up 3 times. I asked if I Can just cancel it and still stream and do what I needed and was told yes. When I called back again, they said I will continually have streaming issues (even video calls) because I cancelled the Fusion service and that was my issue, They DO NOT WANT TO FIX ANYTHING! They blame the customer for everything that goes wrong with the service and can not accept any accountability for what the customer reps tell the customers. I have been hung up on multiple times.

Review.Titre: AVOID THIS COMPANY AT ALL COST!!
Review.Contenu: We got this for our cabin and have had nothing but problems; unreliable connection, slow download speed, broken equipment, etc. When they came (late) to install I was enjoying a beer on the deck. The installer, half done, bummed a beer from me … weird! Every time you turn around they charge you for some unexpected item,. You have to manage the data you use. If you go over the service just stops working until you call and pay up … usually costs $50-$75 to get service back up after waiting a long time to speak to an agent. They charge $20 to send you a box to return your equipment and won’t stop billing you at the time you cancel. If you have any other option, take it. I’m happy I won’t have this company in my life going forward!

Review.Titre: This provider was too expensive and not…
Review.Contenu: This provider was too expensive and not upfront about data limits and cancellation fees. Doing business with them was the biggest mistake I ever made.

Review.Titre: No one wanted to do their job and did not know how.I followed instructions with my new…
Review.Contenu: I followed instructions with my new modem calling for 1 hour to boot.  I called the help desk after that did not work and the rep said it takes 3 hours to boot.  That not working I called again and a new rep said it takes 4 hours to boot. I just left it on all night and still not working, and called back.  After a long time on the phone they sent a tech out.  The tech fixed it very fast saying many modems are improperly programed. The help desk should have been aware of this so it would not have taken 5 days to get a new modem running.  No service excellence, only under performance!!  Hughes is a communication company yet they have no internal communication.  Long time customer but not a happy one right now.

Review.Titre: Slow to no service after upgrade
Review.Contenu: Slow to none! Started off w/50gb.. had no issues. Upgraded to 100gb w/all being depleted in a few weeks. Then I upgraded to 200gb at night time w/customer service saying the next day it had all been used w/in 24 hours of getting it?!? It wasn’t even used. They gave me credits & upgraded my account after me letting them know I was going to cancel their service.

Review.Titre: We have had Hughesnet since 12/29/22
Review.Contenu: We have had Hughesnet since 12/29/22, I would not recommend them to my worst enemy. We had nothing but bad service, movies buffer every day of the month, but they can only tell us that it is because we have run out of gb’s. But are unable to give us a reason for the buffering on day 1 of our service. They only want to help us out by selling more gb’s. Who wants to pay for more, when you don’t get good service on what you are already paying for.

Review.Titre: The did not credit me for $40.00 for 4…
Review.Contenu: The did not credit me for $40.00 for 4 months and also did not apply my $30.00 for assistance even though you said it would be applied. Steven

Review.Titre: Our internet will not pick up when we…
Review.Contenu: Our internet will not pick up when we try to get on Netflix or streaming on the TV gaming is totally out ,it will work sometimes but most of the time  it doesn't

Review.Titre: Well it was fixed by a rep were I could…
Review.Contenu: Well it was fixed by a rep were I could do so much of my payment and junly 31 I could finish paying it you could fix it were my signal is stronger not buffing so muchDate of experience: July 14, 2023

Review.Titre: PLEASE DO NOT BUY....
Review.Contenu: PLEASE DO NOT BUY..... this is the worst internet conpany there is... my speeds are the slowest... always are refreshing... NEVER WORKS AND ALWAYS LOSING SIGNAL.... THE WORST INTERNET COMPANY

Review.Titre: They misrepresented what they were…
Review.Contenu: They misrepresented what they were selling now in a 3 yr contract but only leaving here for a yr.  Horrible speed and quality my wireless 5g phone does better.

Review.Titre: Don't Do It
Review.Contenu: Totally agree with the other reviewers about the buffering.  It's constant and varies little from the first day to the last day of your billing cycle. And then they try to sell you more gbs or some other kind of service.  If they're your only choice, stream through your phone.  There is a thumbdrive type device called the ScreenBeam Mini that really helps the connection from phone to TV.  Stay away from HughesNet.

Review.Titre: I was forced to pay $823 dollars for…
Review.Contenu: I was forced to pay $823 dollars for two months of internet service which I didn’t mind, the other 600 dollars were for tokens that I didn’t order!

Review.Titre: Nothing Has Changed in Twelve Years
Review.Contenu: Every couple of months I have to call the technicians because the service is too slow or not going at all. Then I’m doing business in the phone and need to do several functions with a client, it is really embarrassing and frustrating because my phone or laptop is stuck on buffering. Seriously, I’ve had a new modem and dish put in within months and here I am again waiting for service. My neighborhood is having fiber optics installed, and I can’t wait until it’s complete. It’s been 12 frustrating years with your company.

Review.Titre: I wasted a whole afternoon getting my…
Review.Contenu: I wasted a whole afternoon getting my voice/text back on my cell phone because the sales lady NEVER told me that I would need to have a different carrier for voice/text.  Hughes ONLY provides a landline for voice.  Otherwise, they are just a satellite internet provider...& that sucks too...don't get a good connection sometimes & slow speeds.  I was with Spectrum but they raised their rates & weren't willing to go down much...so I switched.  Even tho I hate Spectrum for their high rates I have to admit they provide the best internet connection...I have no idea about cell phone...but assume it's fine.  I use Mint Mobile...just $15 bucks a month!....16.76 w/fees.

Review.Titre: I haven’t been able to get on the…
Review.Contenu: I haven’t been able to get on the internet in 2 weeks and lights are white on modem.  Fed up

Review.Titre: Hughes really let me down on high speed.
Review.Contenu: I have talked to chat four days now to correct my slow internet speed.  they have said that by buying tokens or whatever that it is fixed and yet each morning it is back to slow.  I am handicapped and must have high spped constantly.

Review.Titre: streaming movies, series and live Tv sucks..
Review.Contenu: Same problem as always.. Can't strem movies, series, with out it buffering, Either 10 - 20 minutes into movie, or it just logs me out of app after minutes of buffering...

Review.Titre: It took 3 contacts to HN tech support…
Review.Contenu: It took 3 contacts to HN tech support to fix an obvious problem on your part. We still are having streaming interruptions. Not sure we are going to keep the service .  We feel I home live person tech support would be very helpful.

Review.Titre: I have upgraded my plan so I don't have…
Review.Contenu: I have upgraded my plan so I don't have to experience buffering and I still continue to have this problem. I can't really afford to pay so much for Internet but I'm a student and I must have it. But for what I'm being charged I'm not satisfied with my service.

Review.Titre: Just confused on how I pay for…HYPE
Review.Contenu: Just confused on how I pay for supposedly reliable technology that doesn't work as hyped. TV adds are misleading.

Review.Titre: Poor speed
Review.Contenu: The speed of this is terrible, & I was not aware that the plan had a limit!!!!

Review.Titre: Problems with Hughes Internet
Review.Contenu: Speaking with various people at your tech site, they all have different solutions.  As soon as I hang up the phone the internet goes off again.  I have other things to do besides stay on the phone with your experts (?)  Every day there's outages, usually when I'm doing something relating to my recent heart attack.  I cannot deal with this.  Surely there's an answer out there somewhere.  Besides, I'd appreciate dealing with someone whose English speaking I can understand without having to have everything repeated numerous times.  Friend says she just got rid of Hughes for similar problems.

Review.Titre: I was given no notice that my bill was…
Review.Contenu: I was given no notice that my bill was due, my account was overdrafted, after contacting support I was told I was given an extension but here I am 3 days later and my account has not been updated. The total I got for my problems was $10 off of 3 months to cover the $60+ in overdraft fees that could have been avoided with a minimal effort at communicating

Review.Titre: I thought everything had been resolved
Review.Contenu: I thought everything had been resolved, however, your employee - Ceasar - stated that I would need to be assisted by a "professiona"  no explanation was given as to why or when.  I now find that I am disconnected for the internet often and two different speed test result in not getting any upload data.  Several apps on my cell phone will no longer function with your internet but will run if I use my data.  I will be back to you soon if you don't contact me asap

Review.Titre: Internet is Terrible
Review.Contenu: Sorry to pay& sorry to say- Internet is terrible. Goes in & out. I’m home 22 days a year with my job. I got the service earlier this year & was promised better connection & service by the end of the year for my area (more cell towers being built) but no. The people who I’ve spoken to though- have been wonderful!

Review.Titre: SLOW complaint!!
Review.Contenu: I just called recently complaining about the inter being so slow, they said they increased the speed a bit for me , well it is still slower then ever , can;'t open most videos, and opening a new website takes forever it is ridiculous, I usually hace to get on to my Grandsons T-mobile to get any work done.. very disappointing..

Review.Titre: We are back home and hughes net…
Review.Contenu: We are back home and hughes net restarted.  Supposed to be better than ever.  It is so slow!  Cannot get anything done in a  hurry.  Billing reads like we're paying for 5 gb and getting 2.  This is supposed to be the best service for our area.  I was quoted pymt to be about $58 and with all your extras almost 100 for poor service.  Very disappointed again!  Lois Jornlin

Review.Titre: You people have no way of keeping my…
Review.Contenu: You people have no way of keeping my records straight I have ACP credit and you let it run out without letting me know I called them and they told me it is not expired I went through 2 hours of phone calls and email and online support to try to get you people to understand I need my ACP credit it took 2 hours for you people to get it right I'm not happy with you

Review.Titre: Internet is always slow
Review.Contenu: Internet is always slow, with constant buffering.Internet has gone out 3 times within the last 6 weeks and I have to sit on the phone for at least an hour while technical support troubleshoots.

Review.Titre: Service sucks too expensive…
Review.Contenu: Service sucks to expensive and limited internet once you finish your data plan it will not work even on slowest rate doesn’t work anymore so what they called a bonus is more like crap because it will not work at all Custumer service is good but other than that service and price sucks

Review.Titre: The setup was fine but the service we…
Review.Contenu: The setup was fine but the service we have is horrible. I have called twice to restore good internet but that hasn't happened yet. Pages load slowly and videos buffer for long periods of time. I would not recommend  Hugh's foe internet to anybody. R. BENNETT.

Review.Titre: Poor Service. Poor Customer Service
Review.Contenu: The service was poor. We could not use our telephone if the television was on the internet. When a more reliable service became available in our area, we signed up. Hughes.netk customer service was very rude and upset when we did not agree to continue with their service with their options offered. This was very disappointing. I regret  using Hughes.net.

Review.Titre: The installer did not install outside…
Review.Contenu: The installer did not install outside cable properly. I didn't check it until after he left. It was installed loosely running along base of home. Should have been installed running along top, under the eve.He also has cable running under front door,which is a tripping hazard.

Review.Titre: Called regarding the data cap
Review.Contenu: Called regarding the data cap, did not fully understand when signing up.  Customer representative was very helpful.  HughesNet itself is not what I expected!  Speeds are slow, some webpages just will not load, (do not try to look at the weather radar as it will not load) and apps like Netflix are often slow and very difficult to rewind.

Review.Titre: The technical support reps should know how the hugesnet system works.
Review.Contenu: I experienced no internet serivce even though the tests I ran stated otherwise. The rep kept asking me to disconnect the modem and reconnect. He stated that since the tests stated there was a problem there was nothing he could. The real problem was that the satellite was having problems. I found this out after my third call to Hugesnet techincal support.

Review.Titre: Streaming is difficult for your rural customers
Review.Contenu: I am paying a bunch of money for service which I think are less than acceptable.  I should be able to stream movies from a few places that I have access to but the BUFFERING makes watching anything off the internet frustrating.  Yes they lowered my rate and increased my speed but it is not apparent.  I only watch TV late evenings for about 2 hours.  Otherwise it is too slow and I don't have time to sit for connecting to the internet.

Review.Titre: The person I spoke with seemed very…
Review.Contenu: The person I spoke with seemed very knowledgeable and professional. However we are still experiencing the same problem with our new phones. We cannot make or receive calls without cutting out or sounding garbled.  Our Wi-Fi setting is showing no internet service consequently our phones can’t make a call. Very frustrating

Review.Titre: the speed is not stable
Review.Contenu: the speed is not stableto make the paumnet every month is a disater, you rsend reminders, when we try every month to make the payment via  acredit card , and oit take several days until your systems accept it

Review.Titre: Service is often spotty with frequent disruption of service.
Review.Contenu: Service is often spotty with frequent interruptions for buffering. Loss of service entirely happens frequently as well. Monthly rate is too high for unreliable service. I understand how the weather could affect service. However, loss of internet occurs nearly every day even in perfect weather. I am a senior citizen & a shut-in. Due to high cost of tv service, my only media at present is my access to the internet--streaming, facebook, emails, games, news, searching /downloading music, craft & crochet patterns--so I rely heavily on being able to access the internet.

Review.Titre: Poor service
Review.Contenu: Our internet went out on 12/22 and was not restored until 12/29 at about 7pm at night. My husband and I called in 8 times to resolve the issue. After  technician did not arrive at our home on 12/26 as scheduled we learned it was a Hughesnet error. I had planned to be on vacation from work and just check in intermittently, but this caused me to go to a coffee shop, spend money on a coffee, and work for 2-3 hours each business day. When asked to share my frustration with a supervisor I was told they were not available to speak to me after waiting about 20 minutes to speak to someone.

Review.Titre: poor modem performance
Review.Contenu: I have noted that my LAN ports on the back of my modem are MAJORITY yellow and orange; I have complained about this but have received no response. The modem from my previous provider was majority green for its ports. Thus far, I've received no feedback or resolution to this issue: ergo, my 'two stars' for this review.

Review.Titre: Your support staff is always helpful BUT....
Review.Contenu: Your support staff is always helpful.  Our challenge is how often we have to contact them!  We have to reset our equipment nearly every day and even then we don't always have service or lots of "pauses" after many resets.  Very frustrating.

Review.Titre: Data Usage numbers all over the place.
Review.Contenu: After calling and trying to understand once again-  I got no answer as to why my connected device's data usage ( where it breaks down how much each device uses in data in 24 hours) is way less ( 5 gb) than what data they say I used? I upgraded my service to 100 gb a month and watched a movie, and went to bed. Only to wake up to it saying I've used 17 gb of data over night.  The technician basically said " oh your devices still use data when you sleep" even though the connected devices' numbers don't support 17 gb of usage , and its never used that much over night. I got a brick wall and a repetition of the same explanation without any questions actually being answered. It feels like their data usage evaluation is aa scam and in no way accurate. Considering data is what I pay for - this is a huge problem. After y 12 month contrast is over I'm switching to something else.

I rely heavily on my phone data in over to get anything done and I just HATE this internet, and they've already sent a tech out once and did diagnostics and attempted to correct it 3 Times over the phone. I genuinely just can't stand the service and will be going with a different provided as soon as possible.The people do their best and are really friendly, just the internet it self is horrible.

Review.Titre: Auto billed in error, still waiting for my refund
Review.Contenu: The service in my area is not what I need.  In Nov when I tried to cancel I was talked into placing my acct on a 6 month seasonal hold and was told my automatic CC payment would be removed.  Fast forward to March, I am charged $258 with no notice.  When I call in on 3/19 the automated system says I am on auto pay again.  I speak to a rep and I am told I am receiving a refund because she can see that what I am saying is accurate.  On 3/30 I still have not received my refund.  When I call in I am told that Michelle did not leave any notes.  Talked to several people and spent over 40 minutes trying to get this taken care of. The 'Acct Manager' kept putting me on hold just saying they are looking into this.  Then he tells me he can only credit me one month of service, and only credit my Hughesnet account not my credit card. I had to ask for a supervisor, wait another 10+ minutes, then got my refund on my card.  This is a very poor way to run a business.  The only reason I am giving 2 stars is because the 2nd person I spoke to today was very nice, thorough, and understanding.  If we had not been disconnected I don't think it would have taken over an hour.

Review.Titre: Our internet had been out for several…
Review.Contenu: Our internet had been out for several days. We live in an area with absolutely no cell signal without a Verizon extender working off the internet. When the internet went out, the VOIP home phone went out. So I had to drive to Fort Leonard Wood to get signal to call HughesNet. Customer service tried to assist, but told me I had to be at the modem in my home for them to talk me through the process of fixing the issue. Again, I could not do that because of no means to call them from the location of the modem. Shortly after the conversation I had to travel to a funeral and haven’t had time to follow through. The representative did tell me that it would cost me $150 for a service call if they sent someone out. Since we recently established HughesNet service and a representative came out multiple times to work on the system because of a problem HughesNet detected, and we still have an issue, that HughesNet would not charge for a service call.

Review.Titre: Salesman and Installer..then more MORE $
Review.Contenu: We spoke to Tony  1-21-23 who sold us on HughesNet, great pricing,very friendly and professional. Installer, same experience and explained what he was going to do. I (Mrs.Herod) asked if they had small dishes,Tony said yes. He got a HUGE dish, and placed on a pole. We can live with that.Our 1st bill we paid with a Debit card not our creditcard. No one told us how our next bill would be coming,so used our Debit card which we did not authorize and got a note that they cant use it. I was waiting for an invoice but no one TOLD us our monthly bill comes on line. So, now we need to pay $5.00 a month for an INVOICE, PLUS they charged us $25.00 for the pole. I gave them my MasterCard for that only but future payment will be by a check when I receive my monthly bill. I also want to be notified when my two year contract date is to expire. It does not cost $5.00 per mo to mail an invoice.  No one informed us about that extra $60/per yr from the beginning. Not sure if I want to continue this after the two year contract expires. Anymore surprises in the billing in future best NOT HAPPEN unless advance notices thru the mail. Elizabeth Herod

Review.Titre: Signed up for the new Fusion…
Review.Contenu: Signed up for the new Fusion plan...supposed to be so much faster and more reliable.  When it works it usually is faster, (most of the time) but no more reliable.  It goes out for no apparent reason.  It may not stay out for long, but it does go out pretty often and it doesn't have to be storming. The main issue I have is the price.  When I signed up for the Fusion there was 2 options, 50G/Month & 100G/Month.  I wanted to start with the 50G/month to see if we would be able to stream movies, etc. and if not, they said I could change the plan.  They offered a discount on the 100/month plan for 6 months, so I opted to go that route; however, since we still can't stream movies I wanted to go back to the 50/Month plan...No Longer Offered!  Now the 100G/Month plan is their base plan for Fusion and the price is 196.00/month - ridiculous.  I appreciate the internet service because we live in an area where we don't have a lot to choose from and I work from home, but I wish I would not have changed at all.  As soon as my new contract is up I will be changing to a different provider.

Review.Contenu: I liked the swiftness with installation, helpfulness of billing and technical support, and the seemingly overall eagerness of everyone I came in contact with, to be helpful. What I dislike is that it seems to buffer frequently, and for no apparent reason.

I did not purchase anything  merely put service on vacation pause ( for second time as I thought that was done in October) I paid Hughes $106  that I received no benefitNo surprise I am not thrilled with Hughes atPresent . No complaints on internet service Though .

When my server still was off on 11/12/23 I called Hughes and got matter corrected and got back online.  On 11/14/23 I received an untimely snail mail indicating my service would be cancelled if no payment received.  Had I known my payment had not been received, I would have corrected the matter promptly so as not to lose my service!

Review.Titre: I honestly don't remember

Review.Contenu: Bad experience from start to now.When setting up in my home, Young man didn't stay till setup was finished and up to now the service is poor.

Review.Titre: I pay $79.99 per month for 15 gigs of…
Review.Contenu: I pay $79.99 per month for 15 gigs of data, and it is always used up before the end of the month. I am not online an excessive amount of time each day; I purchased my own equipment; and being in a rural area means that Hughesnet is pretty much my only option. Service is not particularly reliable, and I think for this amount of money for internet connection only, I should be receiving unlimited data, not being requested to purchase tokens for additional gigs when my data runs out.

Review.Titre: Arrived on day and time promised
Review.Contenu: The installer arrived on time. I am a "caregiver" and was called to leave for an emergency medical appointment. So, I had a neighbor come and stay through the completed project. Upon my return the installer had completed the installation and left our home. I called HughesNet for a review and installation explanation, but the customer service representee was less helpful. I asked if they could send someone (at their convenience), to go over the installation information with me, and was told "no one was available" then referred me to the "Welcome guide, Tools & Resources support brochure". I still have some "cords and wires" behind my desk that go nowhere. Sorry, I'm an 85-year-old "Senior" who still likes to get a "physical" explanation and help when needed!

Review.Titre: First of all
Review.Contenu: First of all, I was not informed of certain things that I had to change later. And getting on your website is next to impossible. When I did get on I was ask a security question that I was never asked in the first place. The last time I called for information, I was given the wrong information.

Review.Titre: Live Hughes netNothing went wrong this time
Review.Contenu: Nothing went wrong this time. The rep was helpful and knowledgeable  about discounts and as a senior citizen how I can get more taken off my bill. Wonderful experience. The only thing I think you should do replace equipment that we already rent after many years. I'm still using rhe old one from 9 years ago when I lived down the driveway and brought it with me 4 years ago. All in all I am very pleased with my service and my ability to connect quickly. Always getting a signal except in bad weather.  Love hughes net.

Review.Contenu: I called because of the constant buffering when we try to stream something.  Went through several steps with the woman on the phone.  The buffering stopped and I said it looks like it is fixed.  We hung up and ten minutes later the buffering started again.  Every time I call about this problem I'm told different things.  I would just like to be able to stream a movie without buffering.

Tech support did help me request my current number to be ported to the Hughes sustem.
