Review.Contenu: Thought conversation weren’t well and I understood every thing. Agent was patient and helpful. Made notes of every thing and confirmed my upcoming year price quote per month( as in my notes) closed transaction. BUT then my next years bill and info was text to me next day! NOT THE PRICE QUOTED! Seems she forgot a  fee!  Tried to get price quoted but to no avail! Asked for higher manager but she would not transfer further. Been a customer for years and now extremely disappointed in our arrangement!!

Review.Titre: Followed directions for installation and still couldn’t get it to work.
Review.Contenu: Followed directions for installation and it still wouldn’t work.  Had to have a visit we don’t think we should pay for. The man thought something was odd and then said they should have told us how to do something over the phone.

Review.Titre: I dislike the the service of not…dislikes
Review.Contenu: I dislike the the service of not contacting the customer directly. Many of your customer are over the age of 65, and they are using cell phones because home phone are quickly becoming a thing of the past . Many seniors are not able to use the internet with the effect as are younger persons,  so a friendly call rather that a text message would be appreciated .

Review.Titre: I called because I lost service
Review.Contenu: I called because I lost service.  The call taker had an extremely strong accent and I had to have her repeat herself multiple times just to answer a question.  Was placed on multiple holds, some longer than others.   Her tone of voice was pleasant, I just feel as if I spent way to much time on the phone.  Fortunately it was a satellite issue which resolved in an about an hour.  Otherwise, this score would be much lower.

Review.Titre: Hire Americans pleased
Review.Contenu: Couldn’t understand the person speaking the first time I called, so I called back and talk to another person who was a little easier to understand. The severe accents are not pleasant when you’re trying to get information. It is too easy to mix up what they’re trying to say because some of their words are not in the correct order.

Review.Titre: The Thing I Like For This Internet I…
Review.Contenu: The Thing I Like For This Internet I Can Wacth Movies And Series in Online But The Thing I Hate About This A Can Play My Favorite Game Online Is The Hates internet for gaming oh please I Have To Way So I Have wait so Many Time To Cancel This Internet To Find A Good One For the one I Can Play My Favorite Game In Online.

Review.Titre: When I enrolled in a contract with your…
Review.Contenu: When I enrolled in a contract with your company several year ago, I was under the understanding that what I was paying for the service was covering my home's TV, computer and phone.  I started receiving emails about tokens.  I contacted Hughes and purchased 30 Tokens.  I feel that you are comitting . fraud.

Review.Titre: well i had an issue with my bill
Review.Contenu: well i had an issue with my bill. we tried to move up and get more data but for three months i paid a higher price but still didnt get the extra data. and this last month they did credit my account for the extra amount paid but it caused issues with my signal. and i am having to reset my billing cycle as our income dates have changed. and because of those changes i have been late paying my bill. but we couldnt change it until tomorrow due to the issues occurring with my account over the amount being credited back to my account. hope all of this makes sense and thank you for listening.

Review.Titre: Incomplete installation
Review.Contenu: The installer removed the satellite dish from my previous internet company and told me I could throw it away, which I did. He did NOT remove the TRIA (transmitter)  on the end of it that was to be returned to that company and since I hadn't done this before, I didn't realize it until I got the box from that previous internet company. Luckily I was able to retrieve the dish and had to call on someone for help to remove the TRIA and hope that it hadn't been damaged!!

Review.Titre: The efforts of the Hughes net team and the field techs
Review.Contenu: The efforts of the Hughes net team and field techs were very good. My issues lie within the elements that, since basically being forced into upgrading to the 5G network, my internet isn’t working any better or faster than my old 4G router did, yet, my bill has raised $23 and change! You’d think that a 5G network would be far superior in performance than the performance of my old 10 year old 4G router, but, it isn’t!

Review.Titre: We've been using HughesNet for a long…
Review.Contenu: We've been using HughesNet for a long time for both personal and business computing and have found it to be both good and bad.  Good because we can't get cable and bad because the weather can create problems.We went off the air a couple days ago and called for service and spent an hour on the phone without a cure until we talked to Jacob who did an excellent job of correcting our problem.

Review.Titre: We are experiencing difficulties with…pictures being pixelated and shows having to refresh.
Review.Contenu: We are experiencing difficulties with pixelated pictures. It keeps having to refresh the show we’re watching. I don’t know how else to resolve issues. I will customer support again.

Review.Titre: Still slow, but a little better w/ Fusion
Review.Contenu: My wife works from home and is required to have reliable internet for medical coding through a VPN.  Unfortunately, we live in an area with limited internet. Well after an hour-long technical tweaking we had to upgrade to Fusion.  Now we are able to achieve 5 mbps download during prime-time. We had two days with 20 mbps, but it looks like we will never have the advertised 25 mbps. Moving to a location with faster internet or changing jobs will probably be the only solution.

Review.Titre: could get some decent internet not like…
Review.Contenu: could get some decent internet not like dail up slow as a snail. charge 100.00+ for so called fast internet and then most everytime you on it, it either gives you this site cannot be reached or it will do nothing just set there and grind! Very poor internet service for what you all call fast and reliable internet. NOT

Review.Titre: I did not like the customer service…
Review.Contenu: I did not like the customer service line tried connecting to find out about a letter I received.   Well every time I called punched in the information it hung up on me!!!    Feel for the money I am paying I should be able to talk to a live person.   There are other internet providers maybe I should get one that cares about me.

Review.Titre: Installation was OK but didn’t Your office people are not very good at explaining things when you call for help explain…
Review.Contenu: Installation was OK but didn’t explain the difference between the 2G and 5G. Also didn’t have a wifi booster. Your office people are not very good at explaining things when you call for help. Horrible reception. Horrible customer service. But it’s the only thing available and they know it. Could never understand a word they are saying. Services from a foreign country

Review.Titre: Many time when I turn on my email I see…
Review.Contenu: Many time when I turn on my email I see the notice "no internet connection" and  there is no storm

Review.Titre: The satellite service review
Review.Contenu: The satellite service is poor at best.  Speed is slow.  Constantly dealing with buffering on TV and I-pads.  Constant interrupt of intranet making it very hard to many times complete task on line such as paying bills.  The only plus I have found is your customer service has improved in recent months.  i am sorry I have nothing else positive say.

Review.Titre: Service
Review.Contenu: Trying to get to talk to a person and not a machine to get some answers....should be a button to just talk to a person right off the back when calling.....

Review.Titre: Not The Best, Not the Worst
Review.Contenu: The internet service is not the greatest, and when I stream it buffers often.  When I access something as simple as Sudoku, WordWipe, or a Crossword puzzle, often it would take as long as 10 minutes to load.  As a result, I would go use my monthly alloted minutes earlier.  After contacting Hugesnet for assistance more than once, internet response is faster, but not impressive.

Review.Titre: Need to lower prices
Review.Contenu: I was charged too much. Thats not good.

Review.Titre: Good support
Review.Contenu: Great help from CSR.only negative that I have is the somewhat lagging in bandwidth.at times for some reason I experienced connection and downloads at almost DSL levels?.could e heat wave , sun etc?

Review.Titre: 3 stars
Review.Contenu: Not a fan of the tokens. Also last time we paid the bill but it wouldn't connect until we called and spoke to a representative. Other than that, wifi works great and the only internet service provider that could connect us in "remote" "bad signal" area.

Review.Titre: I am mediately received a bill that…
Review.Contenu: I am immediately received a bill that they said would be adjusted. They had put me as a cancellation instead of a pause and are trying to charge me $300 for it and then I’ve got something today saying that you were denied to take it out of my account.

Review.Titre: I called 3 weeks ago to smy Visa…
Review.Contenu: I called 3 weeks ago to say my Visa card was compromised, and I would call back with the number of a new card as soon as I got it. During that time I received 2 emails from HughesNet that my service would be discounted  without payment. I called back the day after Labor Day with the new number, and accomplished nothing after a half hour on the phone. The fella kept asking me questions, and then said I would have to call a 3 digit number then star. This didn't work. Talked to him further until I said I was done. He had the new number, I was too frustrated to talk any further.A week later a got a letter stating my service was soon to be discounted. I called again.This time I think it was resolved. Wouldn't be surprised if I get another letter or service disconnected.

Review.Titre: Was disappointed Hughesnet was charging…
Review.Contenu: Was disappointed Hughesnet was charging me so much for such a long time and only now offered to lower my rate !   However service has improved

Review.Titre: The only reason I am giving 3 stars is…
Review.Contenu: The only reason I am giving 3 stars is because the internet is not that good. Customer service was great and the installer was wonderful. Just not happy with internet speed. I had Spectrum for years and it was wonderful. Had no idea that this service would be so much slower. We are able to have Netflix, however sometimes slow to load or it will say unavailable. Only changed to Hughesnet because we moved.

Review.Titre: I wish you didn’t have contracts
Review.Contenu: I wish you didn’t have contracts .I was told I would have a lot more down load and up load speed.I don’t have 2mega bytes of download speed and upload is about .27 I can’t send more than 1picture at a time and then over half the time it times out before it sends.Sometimes it takes me 20 minutes to pay one bill online My internet is almost useless I have to keep this for another year before I can try someone else. Don’t even try to find out why it is so slow and uses so much data.They say they will send someone out but will charge extra I just can’t afford it

Review.Titre: I was not happy that they could not…
Review.Contenu: I was not happy that they could not refund my money. Were they overcharged me for this month because it put me in a spot with my other bills they said they was going to credit it to November’s bill but I needed the money now but I guess it is what it is. Thank you. And they take it auto pay which goes out right away, so why can’t they refund right away? I never did understand that.

Review.Titre: Your employees are fine
Review.Contenu: Your employees are fine. I still am not impressed with the constant repeat of not being on wifi when I actually have it. The speed is not what I would expect. This is an ongoing problem that I reported

Review.Titre: Installer was efficient and fast, but...
Review.Contenu: Installer was efficient and fast. Seemed to do what he was supposed to do well. We had problems with understanding how to get our new technology to do for us what we wanted. The installer was rather cold and matter of fact with, poor clueless customer skills. We still can not function in the things we were looking to do, Zoom. Need someone people friendly to do follow ups.

Review.Titre: I attempted to resolve my problem with…
Review.Contenu: I attempted to resolve my problem with your automated system but half way through it stopped and put into a menu for services. Then I had to wait over ten minutes for a service representative.

Review.Titre: I've had HughesNet before and slowly my…
Review.Contenu: I've had HughesNet before and slowly my bill rose to $155 per month on autopay. When I discovered it I was enraged and cancelled them. Unfortunately, the service I changed to is worse than Hughes, so in picking the lesser of the evils, I decided to go back to Hughes. Again, unfortunately, as of this date, 5/30/23, I still am waiting on Hughes to restore my account...

Review.Titre: My first call did not go well the lady…
Review.Contenu: My first call did not go well the lady that I spoke with did not apparently know much about availability of HughesNet and how the billing system works she was of no help whatsoever. I called again and got a nice young man who tried to work with me and help me get my bill lowered which I truly appreciated I do not like how it just creeps up and creeps up every month. I will give this some time and if I still have the same issue there are other options available for me. I have had HughesNet for over 20 years and really never had any problem till the past few months.

Review.Titre: Service ok but NO Customer Support number
Review.Contenu: The service is relatively reliable and the speed ok for the format. Customer Service almost non-existent given the phone numbers listed for same. I had to call sales and threaten to cancel before I got an actual person on the line. However, once connected he was very good at helping me

Review.Titre: I still have buffering problems at…
Review.Contenu: I still have buffering problems at night despite a 500 mgs of data . I am currently exploring other sources for internet providers due to Hughes inability to solve this issue.Your rep was very patient and had an answer for all my questions. My buffering issues are almost always at night.

Review.Titre: I am assuming that this is related to…
Review.Contenu: I am assuming that this is related to my internet service.  Erica, the young lady I spoke with on the phone was wonderful and assisted me in increasing my limit.However, the internet service has not been very good for some time.  I can look at some websites but the  download speed is frequently slow.  5G will rarely load at all; and 2G is frequently very slow.  We can not stream anything unless we use our phones (Verizon) so it is useless for that.

Review.Titre: Didn't help the problem at all.
Review.Contenu: Didn't help the problem at all.Our service with Hughes net is terrible.  If i am on my phone, I would say about 98% of the time I have to dissable internet on phone for anything to load up. I have to use my phones data and then it loads right up. Also while watching movies, I get frustrated and usually just turn the movie off, because of all the buffering. So I'm wondering why ì am paying for something for nothing.

Review.Titre: No notification of new upgrades
Review.Contenu: New upgrade is great but they never notified me it was available until second call about how slow my connection was.  Turns out to be outdated equipment.  Wish they would have replaced it sooner.

Review.Titre: I called because I could not play…videos
Review.Contenu: I called because I could not play videos on Facebook, particularly bad in the “watch” tab.  Your employee convinced me that increasing the mb (?) from 25 to 30 should solve my problem.  Unfortunately, it didn’t help at all, so I don’t want to be paying for the 30 when it didn’t change anything.  When I first got Hughes Net, the videos played fine.  Please respond.  Thank you.

Review.Titre: Smooth installation, bad performance.
Review.Contenu: The installation technician was fantastic. He explained everything and got the system working before he left. The problem is with the system performance and pricing. The pricing was higher than what I was quoted upon signing up. The performance is 1/3 of the speed I was told the system would handle.Specifically, I was told it would be 75 MBPS but my testing only produced 20-30 MBPS. Furthermore, I need to use a repeater for adjacent rooms. The signal is often lost and a reset of all related equipment is needed to restart. This is connected to DIRECTTV streaming, and the other computers using the internet are extremely slow when streaming. The ping is over 1000 ms and that does not support gaming at all.

Review.Titre: Upset in Dixie
Review.Contenu: Well, I asked a rebate lady about 3 months ago, I called about your rebate of 300.00 credit card and I went thru several of your associates until I finally got a 30.00 discount on my bill until I got the amount.  I talked to one of your rebate people to get it multiple times. Now, I been told by Verna tonight that I could not get it.  Come on people keep up with your customer's conversations on the computer, so you will know what's going on or get competent people to handle what's going on.  If it was'nt for having to pay a 190.00 leaving fee.  I'd drop you in a "New York Minute.," I still want my 300.00, the one that your customer service never told me there was an expiration date.

Review.Titre: 1st month
Review.Contenu: I liked the prompt availability for installation. The technician arrived a day later than scheduled. I don’t like that I have to pay a rental fee for the router. That should be included in the monthly fees, or be given the option to buy it so that we reduce the monthly cost.

Review.Titre: This internet experience is no what i expected. t what I…
Review.Contenu: This internet experience is not what I expected.  For the money I pay, there is way too much buffering and slow streaming to suit my needs. I can't wait for my contract to end. All internet and TV streaming in my area lacks integrity.

Review.Titre: our true experience with Hughes
Review.Contenu: we have our internet with them and we have purchased their highest whatever and yet our internet service stinks.  Our neighborhood do not use Hughes and they all have lived here all their lives and they all say Hughes is not what they use.

Review.Titre: Generally not elated
Review.Contenu: Generally, I am not elated with the service - its seems to be unreliable.  Plus it won't work with my security cameras for some reason.  Up load is too slow also.  Expensive for mediocre capability.

Review.Titre: False Advertising
Review.Contenu: In August of 2022 Hughes Network advertised a $300 visa gift card for signing up so I did and never received my card. I was told that it would be mailed after 6 months of on time payments I then called and was told that I needed to print out a rebate form there is no rebate for the $300 visa card this was all false advertising there never was a $300 visa gift card. I have contacted the BBB

Review.Titre: Satellite is the issue
Review.Contenu: Customer support was great. But it’s the actual satellite that’s the problem. I lose my internet connection every time there is a storm. And this July we’ve had a lot of storms! My power doesn’t go out, but my internet does.

Review.Titre: I have been using Fusion for about 2…
Review.Contenu: I have been using Fusion for about 2 weeks and it has been a somewhat disappointing experience. There are times when the service seems faster and more reliable. However, at other times it is much more spotty and downloading is much slower.

Review.Titre: Some good
Review.Contenu: Some good, some bad. I liked the rep who helped me with my initial problem, but when I asked him to send me an email confirmation, I was transferred to another person who did not answer my call. I waited a long time and finally gave up.

Review.Titre: I contacted the company to see if I…
Review.Contenu: I contacted the company to see if I could get a reduced monthly charge, as I am on a fixed income and just $64.98 to $86/38  Instead of giving me an answer, I was told to go to a government program to see if I qualified for a reduced.  I am on a fixed income and my husband is retired also.  I have been ill for about one year.  I do not use the computer hardly any now.  Can I please get an answer from you without having to fill out government forms,etc?  I completed the gov. form with the exception of uploading pics, etc., which I do not know how to do (this prevented me from finishing form).  Iam not that computer saavy

Review.Titre: Paying over $100.00 a month
Review.Contenu: Paying over $100.00 a month, got your new internet service and still buffering... My 18 year old left, so she isn't using it constantly and still buffering...

Review.Titre: confusing to me on the $50.00 per month…
Review.Contenu: confusing to me on the $50.00 per month stop and restart ant time that I was promised..now I am told nothing is guaranteed and charges may very?????  not the simple plan I was sold...

Review.Titre: The price difference is not worth the drop in speed.
Review.Contenu: The price is too close to other services that do not cut speed to make the speed difference not worth the small price saving.  If I had to do it over, I would pay the higher price to maintain the speed all the time. I will probably change at the end of the year.

Review.Titre: After card fraud, changing my auto payment wasn't easy
Review.Contenu: I was hit by card fraud and had to change my payment option on file. It took 3 different log ins to be able to change the card on file. 2 of those were thwarted by the payment system being "unavailable" which was a pain. One of the log ins was right after Hughesnet sent out a notice that my payment had failed. If a company is going to send notice they should TRY and have the system available for at least 24 hours!

Review.Titre: The internet connection is troublesome…
Review.Contenu: The internet connection is troublesome even on a sunny day.  It is something I have to live with where I live.  I also have Dish and it seems to stay up more than the internet.

Review.Titre: WIFI is very slow
Review.Contenu: WIFI is very slow. I get disconnected frequently.  For the monthly cost I would expect better.  Buying extra "tokens" to keep speed up is ridiculous.  I would switch carriers if I could.

Review.Titre: Service is problematic in my area
Review.Contenu: Service is problematic in my area. Cost is unreasonable for what you recieve. I can say the agent who addressed my problems was very helpful trying to assist me.

Review.Titre: Standard entry level internet
Review.Contenu: Weĺl, if you need to have internet the service is ok.  Being a satellite company, i dont see why the service isnt exceprional.  However, in my area, it is sub par.  Why? I have nothing to obstruct my line of sight,

Review.Titre: I have not had good reception since…
Review.Contenu: I have not had good reception since this was installed. I want to go back to Century Link but I cannot because of the two-year clause. There are two other desktop computers in the house. Their reception is spotty. I don't like Hughes Net.

Review.Titre: We are well pleased with our Hughes net…
Review.Contenu: We are well pleased with our Hughes net service, however we recently had a change in our credit card and needed to change it for Hughes.net.  It was almost impossible to complete the change due to the heavily accented person.  I asked to speak to someone who had English as their first language.  This did not happen!

Review.Titre: For the most part I’ve been satisfied…
Review.Contenu: For the most part I’ve been satisfied with the service however, I still get pixelated pictures from time to time. I can’t tell you exactly the date of the experience since it happens at least 3times a month.

Review.Titre: Timely updates that are requested
Review.Contenu: Seems like it's taking a long time to fill my request to update my request. I'm trying to use a smart tv and am unable to get full service because of your internet services? Why?

Review.Titre: Sometimes the speed is quite good but…
Review.Contenu: Sometimes the speed is quite good but at times it seems to hang up and the response is pretty slow!

Review.Titre: The main thing that was wrong was the…
Review.Contenu: The main thing that was wrong was the agent said I would have a $19 credit I did not get a credit they took $19 from my checkbook!

Review.Titre: My internet has been slow for sometime…
Review.Contenu: My internet has been slow for sometime and we can’t stream our tvs at all. So I’m having DISH put in and keeping the internet that I currently have. I talked to someone at HughesNet and tweaked my service a bit and hoping to have it work better. We will see.

Review.Titre: Wanted to remove wifi from my television
Review.Contenu: the first young lady from the Philippines was very cordial and pleasant as we spoke on the phone and she helped me with the cost also. I appreciated that a great deal.I chatted later after I had called my TV provider and the manufacturer to see if they could help me remove wifi from my TV as I do not need it and it was causing me to lose data that I did not need to use on wifi...twice I was disconnected and the 3rd chat person was unable to help me with the solution but offered a department I could call within HughesNet that could disconnect my wifi and reset it all over again..maybe.  I was so tired of dealing with it all day that I just ended the chat and put it all on the back burner so to speak...I have always had very pleasant people when I have called..but my issue was not resolved that day.

Review.Titre: While trying to watch a buffering every minute !!!movie on tv my…
Review.Contenu: While trying to watch a movie on tv my internet was so slow it stopped and buffered every minute! Exhausting. My husband keeps telling me I made a mistake by switching! Uhg

Review.Titre: My acct was fraud which it wasn’t I had…
Review.Contenu: My acct was fraud which it wasn’t I had 2 debit cards hacked and I have been using my new debit for months so they said it’s fraud I have been a loyal customer for over 8 yrs still no internet . It’s in review ! I’m not. Happy camper believe me !

Review.Titre: IT TOOK THREE TRIES TO FIX BUFFERING…
Review.Contenu: IT TOOK THREE TRIES TO FIX BUFFERING PROBLEM.  EACH PERSON WAS VERY POLITE, ETC.  AND THOYGHT THEY HAD FIXED THE PROBLEM.  THE LAST TECH FIXED THE PROBLEM, BUT DIDN'T KNOW WHAT HE DID THAT FIXED IT.  HOPE IT DOES NOT HAPPEN AGAIN.

Review.Titre: Satellite
Review.Contenu: Because of where I'm located satellite is the only option. Consequently the price for wifi is  extremely high. This is subject to cloud coverage and bad weather.

Review.Titre: HughesNet Review
Review.Contenu: The service from HughesNet was actually good.  Why I cancelled was because the voice did not work very well in our area.  I called a couple of times to report the issue,  but they didn’t seem to resolve it.Also their internet speed was all over the place and seldom at 25 mps.   Starlink came around and I decided to go with them.John

Review.Titre: Speeds are seldom as fast as…
Review.Contenu: Speeds are seldom as fast as advertised. I’m glad it’s available but you must be patient when using.

Review.Titre: The little blue circle never stops…
Review.Contenu: i have a problem trying to watch any movies or shows.”, a little blue ring comes on and just goes round and round on just about every thing i want to watch and i finally give up and never get it to work

Review.Titre: i cannot watch live events more than 20…
Review.Contenu: i cannot watch live events more than 20 minutes before buffering interferes i have to wait till recorded wifi slow

Review.Titre: Slow connection...to channels.
Review.Contenu: Slow connection...to channels.First time trying a satellite 📡 Internet. Thank you.

Review.Titre: The people you sent were very nice

Didn’t know we were buying all the equipment up front($1,200). Also didn’t realize it was all ala cart. Thought I was getting just what was included in the package.? But it’s all good. On a farm, no one can hear you scream. Lol.

Review.Titre: I like the fast speed with the initial…
Review.Contenu: I like the fast speed with the initial hookup. I don't like it when periodically I have no internet access. Don't understand why.

Review.Titre: Customer service I experienced was…
Review.Contenu: Customer service I experienced was excellent.  The young man was very helpful.  My concern is that the internet service is not as strong as I have experienced in the city.  I had hoped for a better/more powerful internet.

Review.Titre: this wasn't the installers fault  i…
Review.Contenu: this wasn't the installers fault  i didn't know that a roku box works with the internet and the router has to face the roku box which is connected to the tv with a short cord      maybe the installers could ask if the csrs have roku or something else that needs the router

Review.Titre: The representative helped me navigate…
Review.Contenu: The representative helped me navigate the problem and it wasn't due to Hughes.net problems. Blame it on solar flares!

Review.Titre: The technician was great!
Review.Contenu: The technician was great!!  However the internet service is slow, you have to wait for sites to come up when browsing.

Review.Titre: I got the job done to correct my…satisfaction.
Review.Contenu: I got the job done to correct my account.  The girl was quite helpful and pleasant, only issue I usually have is that when placing the call, the menus are not always the easiest to get through

Review.Titre: Still have questions…
Review.Contenu: You have a good product and the man who installed our service was very good.  However I am very concerned that I can't get accurate information about my usage.  I did a chat with customer service and I was not satisfied with their response.  I also still have some buffering on my TV.

Review.Titre: The guy I talked to was very…
Review.Contenu: The guy I talked to was very helpful.resolved my problem..I found out why my data was going so fast..

Review.Titre: You resolved the issue promptly over…
Review.Contenu: You resolved the issue promptly over the phone. Tech operations were polite and responsive.

Review.Titre: They resolved my situation with a money…
Review.Contenu: They resolved my situation with a money saving solution.

Review.Titre: Might not have local channels been your doings but it…
Review.Contenu: Might not have been your doings but it definitely was not my doings that for MONTHS WE could not watch our local channels and I think we should get a big discount on our bills for all those months

Review.Titre: HughesNet is my internet provider
Review.Contenu: HughesNet became my internet provider when CenturyLink discontinued service in my area. They also have Voice service, not exactly a landline; and it has been a disappointment to me. Dropped calls and a dead line without dial tone. A new Phone adapter was sent out; so HughesNet is trying to make this new customer happy.

Review.Titre: Cannot understand employees …
Review.Contenu: Would have been 5 star but sometimes you cannot understand your employees even though you think they can speak English. I hang up and call back several times. Very frustrating!

Review.Titre: We’ve never had a problem with…
Review.Contenu: We’ve never had a problem with connectivity or internet speed. And the service rep, Lee, is very helpful, efficient, & knowledgeable.  We live off-grid & very remote, so we realize how important getting in touch with technical assistance is.  Calling the customer service reps is the only negative; long wait time & assistants that are hard for us to understand. But we’re grateful that you provide a great internet service.

Review.Titre: SERVICE CHANGES
Review.Contenu: AFTER SELECTING THE CORRECT OPTIONS, THE REPRESENTATIVE WAS KIND AND PROFESSIONAL AND PERFORMED THE REQUIRED ACTIONS FOR OUR ACCOUNT.

Review.Titre: The representative I spoke to was very…
Review.Contenu: The representative I spoke to was very helpful.  The whole problem was HughesNet's fault.  I had updated my card information the month before and just assumed it would stay updated, but it did not.  HughesNet turned off my internet and I had a hard time getting it straightened out, but the representative helped me and was very nice.

Review.Titre: My Rep
Review.Contenu: My Rep. was very professional, she listened to my concern and resolved the issue quickly.

Review.Titre: I got done what I needed to do DISPITE…
Review.Contenu: I got done what I needed to do DISPITE having to talk to Filipinos and have to have them repeat Several time and slower so I could understand them.

Review.Titre: In post part the Billing department…
Review.Contenu: In post part the Billing department needs to understand that it was their modem and radio was going bad, and it was eating up my DATA.  I felt I should be reimbursed. and also some free tokens.  So I give them a 4.     As Our Tech, was A (10 Star ), deserves a raise, and very knowledgeable.  Smiled looked you in the eye and explained a lot. did call , and was on time. Also, his vehicle should be replaced, as windows don't work, and it was Raining hard.

Review.Titre: Always cutting out
Review.Contenu: Always cutting out. Losing Internet every couple days. Women on the phone was professional and courteous.

Review.Titre: I requested a discount to help me…
Review.Contenu: I requested a discount to help me through a rough patch .. the agent worked with a supervisor to offer me a 3-month discount .. thank you

Review.Titre: Helpful
Review.Contenu: Helpful, respectful.  Only little issue is day or two late.  No big deal though.  I'm happy with everything.  Just not sure what I need to do to get 100.00 card.  Seems kinda difficult.

Review.Titre: So far I've been happy with my service…
Review.Contenu: So far I've been happy with my service only thing when the weather is bad the satellite knocks out the Wi-Fi

Review.Titre: The computer end of it was awful; the person was very good
Review.Contenu: The computer end of it was awful. Difficult to understand what I was doing to synchronize my new phone to the satellite internet. The password was an issue as the one on the box per the picture didn't work and neither did the password the original installer had replaced it with. But the service rep who helped me "fix" the problem was patient and professional and knowledgeable.

Review.Titre: The technician was very polite and…
Review.Contenu: The technician was very polite and professional. He kept us informed and was very knowledgeable in his job. He acknowledged exactly what was wrong immediately and let us know that he had to order a part and when we can expect it to be in. He should be considered for a raise.

Review.Titre: Technical support always tries to be helpful
Review.Contenu: Technical support always tries to be helpful, but don't always understand what I am trying to communicate.  They are fixated on the amount of data I have remaining when speed was not my issue.  This is a continuing problem no matter who I talk to.

Review.Pseudo: Cecelia Carr (wife of Arthur W Carr)
Review.Titre: Be More Understanding
Review.Contenu: In all honesty I can not say my recent experience would rate a 5 star.  In the beginning the representative was not very kind or showed any empathy but seemed to be a bit condescending and this really upset me. I had been enduring my issue for a while, I’m an on-time, no payments missed kind of person and I just feel in the beginning I was not receiving the support, understanding I deserved as a loyal customer. Nevertheless, we finally got the issue dissolved with my paying MORE money for the service i really wanted. I don’t mind paying for what I want but I feel like if there’s a problem the representative should check their attitudes and make sure they’re being patient, kind and understanding.

Review.Titre: Personnel are pleasant and helpful
Review.Contenu: Personnel are pleasant and helpful.  They are knowledgeable.

Review.Titre: Internet down
Review.Contenu: I think it would have been a good idea for Hughes Net to let their customers know that they would be switching to another satellite.  I understand that this did cause issues for customers.   I needed technical assistance to get my internet back up and running.

Review.Titre: Internet went out - May be back up in a couple of days.
Review.Contenu: My internet went out and when I called, I was told that it was probably weather related and it would probably be back up in the next couple of days. Not a very good answer in my opinion. In researching to call a number to report, found out that the discount they was given in the beginning had expired and no other discounts were available. Not very happy since it was being charged to my credit card and I did not get a notification of the $20 a month increase.

Review.Titre: I rely on Hugh’s net for my internet…
Review.Contenu: I rely on Hugh’s net for my internet service, on a whole the service is good, even better than most in my area. The only draw back to it is that there is not enough high speed service, unless you buy extra tokens.  I no more than pay my monthly bill and 2 days later I get an email telling me I’m out of high speed usage and you slow down the service, I won’t pay for extra tokens, because I don’t think I should have to for the amount I charged monthly, so I put up with the slow speed, which gets exasperative!

Review.Titre: When the installation  occurred
Review.Contenu: When the installation  occurred, everything went very well.  But  the first installation appointment was totally missed without any notice to me!

Review.Titre: I just wish I didn’t have to call in to…
Review.Contenu: I just wish I didn’t have to call in to see about any special prices to keep my bill from always going up in cost-it seems to go up automatically anyway.

Review.Titre: The person explained things in detail…
Review.Contenu: The person explained things in detail the questions I asked. Very helpful & experienced.

Review.Titre: HughesNet was understanding when I…
Review.Contenu: HughesNet was understanding when I needed it. My debit card number was stolen, so my account was frozen for a time, resulting in a missed payment. They extended the pay date  until my bank could issue a new dcard.

Review.Titre: Having Hughes net allows me use my email.
Review.Contenu: Having Hughes net allows me use my computer.  It is not strong enough to work from home.  Sometimes I lose the signal and that is unacceptable to clients.

Review.Titre: they fixed the problem on phone
HughesNet over all is a good satellite…
Review.Contenu: HughesNet over all is a good satellite service. There are times that the signal is very poor, even though there is only one device using the service. It's at those times I think about looking for another provider, but I do have flex ability with HughesNet to postpone service for 6 months when we are not using it since we only use the service for camping.

Review.Titre: I had Hughes service before and it was terrible. Now couldn't ask for any better.
Review.Contenu: I had Hughes service before and it had a lot to be desired. Bad reception and customer and billing a few other things. Now, it's wonderful like a different company. I love my Hughes. I'm very impressed with Hughes at this point. They will be my Internet provider as long as things don't start getting crazy again. Thank You Hughes.

Review.Titre: Installation was great
Review.Contenu: Installation was great Our tv buffers during shows - not good!

Review.Titre: Hughes Net served me well
Review.Contenu: I live in the country where cable is not available. Hughes Net has provided reasonably good service for some years, especially after we got a new modem six or seven years ago. I am moving now to a senior living facility where cable service is available. I was pleased with a representative with home. I spoke today. Many thanks.

Review.Titre: Needs improvement
Review.Contenu: I didn’t like the fact that I had to threaten to cancel my service before the supervisor had to step in and walk me through online to keep my service. It’s still needs some attention somewhat. It’s better than the first 2 months

Review.Titre: Keep up the good work.
Review.Contenu: The representative was very helpful in giving me information which helped lower  my bill each month.

Review.Titre: HughesNet Rating Has Improved
Review.Contenu: HughesNet treatment of its customers has improved since the competition from Starlink has forced it to do so. Also, the sale of data tokens at discount prices has improved the value for customers. HughesNet, in my opinion, therefore deserves an upgrade from a poor rating to a moderately good one

Review.Titre: I have problems in the evening trying…
Review.Contenu: I have problems in the evening trying to watch tv, and that is the only time we really watch it , their is a few time we watch in the morning or afternoon but not a lot

Review.Titre: Hughesnet support solved my issue
Review.Contenu: I have been a Hughesnet subscriber for years and have experienced some buffering while watching movies.  I ran an internet speed test and saw I was only getting 7 mps instead if the 15 I expected.   I called support and explained the issue, they upgraded me to a plan that provides faster speed at no extra cost.  I’m now getting speeds up to 35 mps and no buffering.  If they wouldn’t have made this available I was thinking of going over to Comcast which recently became available in my area.  I’m staying with Hughesnet.

Review.Titre: when I call I get someone that cares
Review.Contenu: when I call I get someone that cares!  I have been very lucky with my call ins in getting a great assistant.  Then maybe HughesNet has great attendants to do this. It is nice to get someone that cares and will go that extra mile in helping you.  Thank You HughesNet....

Review.Titre: Great people. Stupid computers
Review.Contenu: The person I talked to helped out I had so many questions.  He helped out. But he could NOT explain why your system keeps telling me to register my account. Which it isPeople are great. Computers are a pain. Hate them. And i already gave my review of this experience

Review.Titre: I still need a little help
Review.Contenu: What I like is that you ask my opinion, and my experience. I like that you gave clear instructions as to what to expect when the service man came to our house to install the satellite dish. Unfortunately, we sometimes turn on the device and find we do not have the Internet. So we have to re-program the device. Usually it comes on after that. Another puzzling thing, is that my desktop can get to the Internet by Microsoft Edge but not by Google. When I try to get into Google, it says I do not have Internet. I’m open to suggestions as to how to correct these two issues. Thank you.

Review.Titre: When i sign up for hughesnet was told…
Review.Contenu: When i sign up for hughesnet was told that id never run out of GB just streaming that was a lie from the person i talk to. But when i call the tech the other night he got it start and put on new plan it higher then i want to pay but cheaper then DTV the tech was very helpful.

Review.Titre: Because of a change with my bank
Review.Contenu: Because of a change with my bank, it was necessary for me to change my credit card information.  Though I had trouble trying to correct my information on the website, once I was able to speak to a human representative things went very smoothly.

Review.Titre: questions asked answered right away
I am a new customer
Review.Contenu: I am a new customer and I have experienced good internet service so far. There has been a few times that my service went to buffering shows. We only got this service for the internet. Time will tell. Actually I am waiting for the new satellite to come on board.

Review.Titre: I was happy to see my internet back up…
Review.Contenu: I was happy to see my internet back up and running, I was about to leave hughesnet because I been having so much problems and it stays off more than I used it. So now I'm gonna see how long it's going to work this time. But overall  the technician was great and very aware of the problem, and very polite!

Review.Titre: I think that our reception is good and…
Review.Contenu: I think that our reception is good and we just upped our coverage to 50 gigs. The reason I didn't give Hughes 5 stars is because of the man who installed Hughes. He never buried the cable that runs across the grass from our dish to the house. I called him about it and he acted like he didn't understand my concern. Ironically, he wasn't afraid to ask me for a tip when he was finished installing. I mentioned about the exposed wire to a gal from Hughes. She said that Hughes would come do it at a cost. I think the buried cable should have been part of the original installation. Other than the exposed wire, I would have given Hughes five stars. Gerald Harpt N3231 River Drive 49893

Review.Titre: I was informed about new updates to my…new offers updates and discounts.
Review.Contenu: I was informed about new updates to my service that actually saved me money on my monthly bill and for once I didn’t feel I was being pressured into any commitment that I was not comfortable with!

Review.Titre: When I still have minutes of usage…
Review.Contenu: When I still have minutes of usage during a month, Hughesnet is good.  During later in the month, their support stink.  I believe $99.99 per month should buy me enough usage minutes to get me thru the entire month.  I & my wife have become use to the degraded connectivity when we have heavy cloud cover.  We just wait a bit for the weather cell to pass on and our dish and your satalite get their signals back together.

Review.Titre: Internet access problems
Review.Contenu: The problem I had was explained and handled expertly. I’m still having trouble accessing the the internet during prime time hours with the programming buffering and dropping programs when I do access them.

Review.Titre: Get unlimited plan
Review.Contenu: The agent did a good job. I'm dissatisfied with the fact that I have to keep adding tokens to make my streaming smooth and uninterrupted. I'm paying $136.00 for 200 gigs. My suggestion is that you have an unlimited no buffering plan at a great price. Forget about the tokens plan.

Review.Titre: HughesNet made access to govt.assistance easy
Review.Contenu: I finally applied for the government assistance I thought I would be eligible for. This helps pay $30.00 of my internet bill each month. Hughes net made this process really easy for me and I appreciate that. I’m looking forward to a smaller bill this month.

Review.Titre: Transaction went well
Review.Contenu: Transaction went well. Upgrade service by phone was great. What should have been a website upgrade was non-existent. Would have saved a lot of time using the website instead of having to wait for a HughesNet Agent.

Review.Titre: Beginning experience
Review.Contenu: I have not had HughesNet service for long, but the sign-up and installation went well. The customer service reps. when I've called on questions, etc. have always been very helpful and friendly in regard to my issues as a senior. I really appreciate that!

Review.Titre: I’m in my 70s and not quite up to a…
Review.Contenu: I’m in my 70s and not quite up to a computer age so I have a lot of trouble using the proper buttons as my fingers are too small without hitting more than just one button at a time I keep trying to use my iPad which is easier to get my finger on the right button But I end up using my phone because it’s easier to get to

Review.Titre: I am glad that you exist
Review.Contenu: I am glad that you exist. Having said that we all need more bandwidth. I am a HEAVY user. I cannot criticize your business model. I just hope that it continues to grow. I am still exploring all of the things I can and can't do with your service. Data restrictions aside. I will be playing a game head to head tonight with my nephew. I hope thing go well. I noticed that you speeds can be choppy. I guess it is the nature of the beast. Still you are much better than Bright speed (more like a shot in the dark) has ever been so far. I am of course reserving judgement till I Have had time to further evaluate your service.

Review.Titre: Hughes Net Rural Service
Review.Contenu: Hughes Net service has been realizable. Not many options available for rural areas. HN has maintained its presence to service the needs of the rural community where I live.

Review.Titre: Up grade
Review.Contenu: I haven't seen much faster on my cell phone, but it hasn't been that long either. So I will continue to watch and see what happens.

Review.Titre: Upgrade
Review.Contenu: My request to upgrade to Fusion 100 was quick & easy, not as costly as I thought it would be for me.

Review.Titre: they resolved my issue
Didn't know I was outdated on Giga…
Review.Contenu: Didn't know I was outdated on Giga bytes.  Y'all upgraded me to 50gb from 30gb and I am paying the same price.  I still feel however, internet service anywhere is a very high cost.

Review.Titre: Great customer service and quick…
Review.Contenu: Great customer service and quick solution to my data plan request. Data speeds are very slow.

Review.Titre: Very helpful and professional
Review.Contenu: Very helpful and professional. The only thing is that when you have promotional adds. Your loyal customers should be able to get in on it. Not only new customers.

Review.Titre: The person did a good job and solved my…
Review.Contenu: The person did a good job and solved my problem. However, you are still asking to speak to my husband, whose name is STILL on the account even though he died 3 years ago. I would appreciate it if you would fix my account to show that he is no longer alive. Thanks, Janice Kozma

Review.Titre: Seems to be reliable and easy to use.
Order and install went great
Review.Contenu: Order and install went great; my only concern is speed.  For example, I got "your internet connection is unstable" during an important Zoom meeting.

Review.Titre: Didn’t like the dish by the front door
Review.Contenu: Didn’t like the dish by the front door. Haven’t gotten my infusion box don’t know how to work it or if it will work.The fact of returning and waiting to get another box. I don’t know what address you are sending it to or if I will get it because I just moved

Review.Titre: much better than Marble Falls company
Review.Contenu: HughesNet internet service is much better than the one that I had (from Marble Falls).  There are times that I lose connection but it comes back pretty soon.

Review.Titre: food network
Review.Contenu: to watch history channell and the company been good to fix my computer

Review.Titre: Improved service
Review.Contenu: I. called to complain and was helped getting updated to a new plan with more data cap and less cost.  I gave them a 4 for improving their service 100% from what i was calling about.  The changes took effect immediately.  Good work!

Review.Titre: Fusion Upgrade
Review.Contenu: With Fusion upgrade we are streaming with no to little delays. Loading circle is all but gone and buffering is not interrupting a movie.

Review.Titre: "Bob" was very helpful
Review.Contenu: "Bob" was very helpful. My internet service is beyond slow after 6 pm, even after changing channels on the Dish and doubling our data.

Review.Titre: Worked with me to honor my budget needs.
Review.Contenu: Your customer service team work with my needs to help with my request. Thank you.

Review.Titre: Inexpensive slowdown prevention.
Review.Contenu: Overuse causes slowdown, a very adult accommodation. Purchase of overflow tabs, also adult. And discount promotions make purchases cost effective.

Review.Titre: Was done very quick and the technician…
Review.Contenu: Was done very quick and the technician was helpful in setting it on my devices.

Review.Titre: Customer Experience Response
Review.Contenu: The process seemed to be smooth and the customer service rep was very helpful and professional. It has improved. I wish the pricing would.

Review.Titre: Not “great”
Review.Contenu: Not “great”, per se, OK for the most part. Have trouble finding accessible sweet spots here on my property. For internet access & calls

Review.Titre: Can't c satellite.   Liking job makes a differencent.
Review.Contenu: Your techniqution was nice. He simed happy doing his job therfor he went above and beyond 2 explain what he was doing and why.  2 me that is great service.

Review.Titre: they listened and appeared to be…
Review.Contenu: they listened and appeared to be concerned

Review.Titre: Quality employees dedicated to their job.
Review.Contenu: The installer was on-time, professional and courteous. He answered all my question and completed the task in a timely manner.

Review.Titre: Slow internet
Review.Contenu: Tech was efficient, knowledgeable and quick.  Problem answered.

Review.Titre: Billing department
Review.Contenu: Austin, in your billing department,  was very helpful on updating my billing file.

Review.Titre: So far good for rural areas
Review.Contenu: So far good for rural areas. I never received th100 dollar gift card I was promised but took it as sales gimmick.

Review.Titre: Experience as a whole was great
Review.Contenu: Experience as a whole was great. Your representative was able to help me in a short time and I received an answer to my question .

Review.Titre: The problem was disconnection
Review.Contenu: I had a real time. The only problem I had for disconnection. I contacted November 2022 it was August 2023 before I was finally able to get it settled.

Review.Titre: Affordable connectivity program
Review.Contenu: The girl I talked to was aware of the program for Veterans and she applied it to my bill which made it much more affordable for me.

Review.Titre: A good choice for where I live
Review.Contenu: HughesNet is a good choice for where I live way outside of town.  I think the price is fair.  There are some times of day (late afternoon) when the service is very slow, but most of the time it's okay.

Review.Titre: I had two experiences with HughesNet…
Review.Contenu: I had two experiences with HughesNet reps. Thefirst was a distaster, but the second was great and took care of my questions.

Review.Titre: must go  thru billing cycles, to insure double billing ism corrected, thanks
Review.Contenu: was able to get corrective action, but took two days and several calls / chat-- to get corrective action-- double billing on my account

Review.Titre: I can see church program and YouTube
the agent i talked to was very helpful…
Review.Contenu: the agent i talked to was very helpful . the agent know what i was talking about and kbew what to do to help me with my problem.

Review.Titre: Good customer service
Review.Contenu: She was very helpful and explaining things to me.

Review.Titre: It’s a struggle to keep my internet up…
Review.Contenu: It’s a struggle to keep my internet up with my phone and I don’t use it much at all

Review.Titre: Great installation service
Review.Contenu: Install tech was on time and knowledgeable and connected everything as it should be.

Review.Titre: Long time user
Review.Contenu: The person that helped me was very nice although my internet doesn’t work any better than before. The only thing now is my payment is more. I’ve been a loyal customer for many years but can’t afford the plan that would make it where I could watch movies, etc.

Review.Titre: Hughes Great Work**
Review.Contenu: The main reason that I changed companies, was the internet was off line than it was on. Since I went with Hughes I have never been without the internet, Thanks from the old goldwinger49

Review.Titre: I had a very nice person to talk to and…
Review.Contenu: I had a very nice person to talk to and she helped me right away. I had never called before and she gave me all the information I needed and in a very friendly manner.

Review.Titre: Hughes Net has really great reception…
Review.Contenu: Hughes Net has really great reception for rural areas. I rarely ever have any issue or need any assistance from customer service, but every time that I have called Hughes Net the customer service has been exceptional. They always help me with whatever my concern is, and resolve my issue completely, or as in my last call the woman who assisted me far exceeded my expectations. She not only helped me, but went above and beyond to give me the best possible customer service that I could ask for.

Review.Titre: Why did my device start slowing drastically?
Review.Contenu: The technician finally asked me if I was running any new programs, and I thought...oh yes! A privacy protector that checks the site I'm at to be sure it's the true site. That must be it. And since she led me down the correct path, my speed on HughesNet is back to normal.

Review.Titre: Just joined HughesNet
Review.Contenu: Just joined. Pleased with cost of subscription, prompt installation, startup support, telephone support for questions. Internet speed improved, streaming adequate for us.

Review.Titre: Installation was fast and profe…
Review.Contenu: The installation was fast and the person who did the work was very professional and kind. He answered all the questions we had and the installation went smoothly.

Review.Titre: Hughes net always makes things right on…
Review.Contenu: Hughes net always makes things right on all occasions. Whether it be service or billing without arguments

Review.Titre: Courteous, patient and knowledgable assistance
Review.Contenu: My experience with the person who helped me was great. She was so sweet and helpful. She is a great asset to your company.However, I wish Hughes were up to the standards, the consistency in the service, I was accustomed to in Texas before I moved here. I'm so weary of the turning wheel, stop,start, stop, start video playing in the evening. Neighbors have left Hughes because of experiencing the same thing. I assume too many people have been signed onto too little bandwidth. We are considering Starlink as an alternative. I hope this note reaches someone who can and will make improvements. Thank you.

Review.Titre: I love support like this!
Review.Contenu: The technician was kind and courteous, along with being patient. She figured out the problem and was able to fix it and get the system back on-line the first time she worked on it. I love support like this!

Review.Titre: Your representative let me know about…
Review.Contenu: Your representative let me know about the new programs are going on and I was very graceful so I changed some of the programs cause I usually don't do it and so that's all I want to find out about increasing my MG so I'll talk to you later.From twin towing.

Review.Titre: The Rep was very helpful and provided…
Review.Contenu: The Rep was very helpful and provided the service I requested. I live in a remote location (off grid) and HughesNet is very valuable to me. Thank-you for the service you provide.

Review.Titre: Hughes Net is the only internet…
Review.Contenu: Hughes Net is the only internet provider in the rural area we're in. The service is somewhat expensive but provides quality service.

Review.Titre: The representative was very helpful, language caused frustration.patient
Review.Contenu: The representative was very patient, very friendly and solved my problem in a short period of time. I had a hard time understanding the rushed, "run together" type of language. It helps when you ask them to slow down, but for only a minute. Example: The "rep" kept repeating "skittled." Finally asked him to spell it, he couldn't. It's a frustrating guessing game, but I finally realized the word was "scheduled" and we both laughed. Wish that could be better, but everything else worked out well.

Review.Titre: Excellent customer service
Review.Contenu: My representative was kind and very friendly. Answered my questions thoroughly. She also double checked some things that were outside of the spectrum of the call. She helped me with trying to figure out the best plan that was available and offered me other resources that were also available. The call was clear and precise and I really liked her personality. You’ve done a great job with hiring this representative to represent your company. Thank you.

Review.Titre: Service is very good
Review.Contenu: Service is very good. Customer service is very good. There's straight to the point honest about pricing and pricing for tokens. A little expensive but where my husband and I live. When it's the only internet choices you pay for what you get sometimes.

Review.Titre: Return 0f funds…
Review.Contenu: The company representative told me over the phone That he was going to close out my account and refund my 315.50 within 24 hours. I check with my bank this morning and your company did what the representative said over the phone. Thank you

Review.Titre: With the previous company I had issues…
Review.Contenu: With the previous company I had issues about twice a month and so far I haven’t had any issues with Hughes Net.

Review.Titre: Great value
Review.Contenu: Great value.  Salesperson did not explain everything.  No  mention of rebate, taxes being paid from my debit without my knowledge, data cycle as relates to billing, but she was very friendly.  Installer was awesome.  Very knowledgeable and efficient.  Answered all my questions.

Review.Titre: Professional
Review.Contenu: HughesNet representative was very professional, patient, pleasant, polite, and articulate.  He resolved the issue without transferring me to another technician. I ended the conversation with a smile on my face.  Thank you HN for keeping good quality rep.  They are assets of the company.  Thank you kindly.

Review.Titre: Getting the job done.
Review.Contenu: The agent understood the problem and knew what to do. The problem was corrected during the call.

Review.Titre: The install went very well
Review.Contenu: The install went very well. Fast and efficient. Was given a review of the router and what I needed to know and where I could find any other info if I needed it in the future.

Review.Titre: Its Not Great
Review.Contenu: Its Not Great! I have more Data But My signal is still too weak to  go  fast anywhere! I dont have a good enough connection to stay in my card games. makes me lose cause I lose connection all the time. Everything runs way tooooooo slow!

Review.Titre: Great sales ,excellent technician
Review.Contenu: Great sales ,excellent technician, but I still haven't got my 100.00 gift card  the internet is very spotty and always blinking out . But every one i talk to have been great 👍 still would like my gift card

Review.Titre: The girl helped me really fast to get…
Review.Contenu: The girl helped me really fast to get my bill paid. My old credit card was expired so now I’m on track and I appreciate your service.

Review.Titre: A very good experience with HughesNet
Review.Contenu: The representative knew what she was doing  too solve  the problem.The residences in customer service know what they are doing to fix a problem they are very good at it.

Review.Titre: The installer did a very good job
Review.Contenu: The installer did a very good job. So far everything has been good . I really like how easy it is to check my account and usage.

Review.Titre: Friendly helpful phone service
Review.Contenu: The phone representative made the process of placing my account on hold seamless. Great job.

Review.Titre: Finding the perfect level for your use.
Review.Contenu: I found that I was using my 50 gb at a faster rate than anticipated and was not able to view everything that I wanted on-line, so I called Hughes Net and spoke to a representative and together we decided to increase my gb to the next higher level, 100 gb per month. So far things seem to be working out just fine.

Review.Titre: Great customer service
Review.Contenu: Great customer service! The installer that they contracted, Dillon, was informative, friendly and professional. The monthly cost for internet is 1/2 of what I was paying.

Review.Titre: HughesNet Customer Service

Review.Titre: Seasonal suspension of service
